abstract: Introducing The Loyal Opposition, Andrew Rosenthal's new political blog.
snippet: Introducing The Loyal Opposition, Andrew Rosenthal's new political blog.
lead_paragraph: If you don't know my name, you probably know my work. I'm the editorial page editor of The New York Times, which means I'm in charge of the paper's opinion sections in print and online - editorials, Op-Eds, letters to the editor and Sunday Review. I head the editorial board, the 19 people who produce the unsigned editorials you can read on our site and in our paper every day. Those articles represent the institutional voice of the board, the editor and the publisher - not, and I can't say this often enough even if Republican politicians refuse to believe it, the Times newsroom.
